creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund
description: Two bronze staff heads with bells suspended from rigid rings. On the rim of example to left three figures hand-in-hand. Two wear the typical late Chimu headdress. A fourth figure is missing. The second example shows a group of figures in a ritual dance, each holding a ring protruding from the girdle of the figure in front. Some bells missing from each staff head.
title: Staff Finial
